Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I play KSP since summer 2013 (0.20) and decided to support its stunning community from now on!

I'm interested in astrophysics and natural sciences, so KSP is a awesome, funny and sometimes crazy game for me.

Best regards,

CookieS

Come to GASEK if you feel qualified!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98446-HIRING%21-NEW-German-Aeronautics-and-Spaceflight-Engineers-Kerbin/page1
guten tag from the other side of the world
